A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For anyone who loved Star Wars: The Force Awakens\, but felt the plot was too similar to A New Hope\, you are in for a delight. The Last Jedi is true to the style and atmosphere of the Star Wars universe and yet brings new surprises and twists. It's deeply adventurous\, moving\, and thrilling. \nThe introduction of new characters adds depth to the universe\, and they are immediately likable and provide tantalizing jumping-off points for future stories - more Star Wars realms to explore!
